It seems like you are trying to access a deactivated account. Activating this account again will require administrator\'s approval.
Deactivating your account means...\n\n-You may no longer view the adoption listing.\n-Your data and account will not be completely deleted from the database.\n -You cannot create another account under the same email address.\n-and Activating your account again will require approval from the administrators.\n\nDo you want to continue?\n

Congratulations! Your request is under review by the City Veterinary Office. Please wait for approval status within 1 to 3 working days. We have received your request. Please wait for approval status within 1 to 3 working days. Your request has been APPROVED! Please set an appointment for your City Veterinary Office visit. Checking the Clinic\'s availability Appointment Confirmed! Your appointment is on \n\nPlease bring the following:\n\n\t- 2x2 ID Picture\n\t- Cage or Leash (Kulungan o Tali)\n\t- Valid ID You have successfully completed the adoption process. \n\nNOTICE:\nPlease be informed that a household can only adopt at most two dogs or any number of cats as long as the pets\' welfare are guaranteed. \n\nPAUNAWA: \nAng bawat pamilya ay maaari lamang mag-ampon ng hanggang dalawang aso o higit pang bilang ng pusa hangga\'t masisiguro ang kapakanan ng mga alagang hayop.
